pr_title: refactor: Removed OpenShift specific config flags from kubernetes-maven-plugin

timeline.message:
refactor: Removed OpenShift specific config flags from kubernetes-maven-plugin

- Enhanced OpenshiftUndeployMojo to remove Build resources along with the BuildConfigs

Signed-off-by: Marc Nuri <marc@marcnuri.com>

timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText:
Any suggestion to make thinks clearer for the user?
What's basically happening is that a user is performing a k8s:watch against an Kubernetes (😓) OpenShift Cluster.
Is "OpenShift cluster detected while using kubernetes-maven-plugin", "Switch to..."  clearer?
replies.author: manusa

replies.bodyText:
Yeah 👍
OpenShift cluster detected, using Kubernetes manifests.
Switch to openshift-maven-plugin in case there are any problems.
